description: SEMI-DETACHED VILLA IN THE MIRAVAL URBANIZATION! Located in the exclusive area of the “Retamar” golf club, which we describe below. And another bathroom with a shower tray. In the semi-basement, a bedroom, currently used as an office, and a bathroom with a bathtub. Already in the basement, a room used as a service bedroom, a large 38 m² garage with automatic doors, and a 40 m² multi-use room. Outside, a large plot of 950 m² that allows us to enjoy total anonymity and privacy as if it were an independent home, mostly equipped with natural grass, which includes a wonderful private pool, barbecue, and porch among many other details that you have to discover! . description: Semi-Detached Villa for Sale Urb. Miraval, Valdeolmos - Alalpardo 4 bedrooms, 373 m2 LS1640 Miramadrid Real Estate sells Villa with a magnificent 1,324 m2 plot located in the exclusive Miraval Urbanization with a Private Golf Club. We begin our visit on the main floor, where we are welcomed by a spacious living room with lots of natural light. We access another space where we find a comfortable living room with a fireplace and large windows with beautiful views of the garden. The kitchen, fully furnished and with appliances, with access to the laundry room, ironing room and pantry area. Exit also to the magnificent porch, with barbecue and wood oven. The toilet will serve the rooms on this floor. We access the semi-floor, where 2 bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and a full bathroom await us. We continue our visit on the 2nd semi-floor where we find 2 more bedrooms, one of them a master suite also with a built-in wardrobe and a bathroom with a hydromassage shower. Another bedroom, with a space designed on two levels, very fun for the little ones in the house. On that floor we give way to an office area ideal for teleworking, where you can see the living room. Also, another bathroom for the secondary bedroom. From the basement, we access the large garage for 4 cars and storage space for tools and bikes.. . It is worth highlighting the house's majestic natural grass garden with fruit trees and orchard, saline water pool, children's area and barbecue area, the privacy of the plot, surrounded by consolidated vegetation. The entire house is equipped with solar panels, aerothermal underfloor heating, bathrooms with screens, double windows and doors, insulating aluminum blinds, mosquito nets, awnings on all windows and many more details. Alalpardo is a quiet town located north of Madrid, a few kilometers from Algete and is perfectly connected to Madrid through various bus lines, access to the A-1 and the M-50. The area is characterized by its proximity to nurseries, parks and services. Don't miss it, you have to come visit it!

74m2 town house and 103m2 warehouse on a 336m2 plot to REFORM. The house is located on a corner plot whose location in the town is exceptional. The property consists of two very different parts, on the one hand, the house and on the other, the warehouse that has also been used to keep cattle.In addition, the plot is completely flat and with a well. The house has three bedrooms, living room, kitchen and a bathroom.It is to be completely reformed but structurally it is in good condition and without leaks or humidity. The warehouse does need reform because part of the area for livestock has fallen off the roof. All this in Alalpardo, a town 30 minutes from the center of Madrid with all services, public and subsidized schools, swimming pool, sports areas, health center, house of culture, restaurants and surrounded by nature. Do not miss the opportunity to come visit it! Extraordinary property in Valdeolmos: La Guapísima. Engel & Völkers presents this beautiful property in Valdeolmos-Alalpardo, 30 km from Madrid. The total surface of the land is 20.000 m2. It has a built property of 1,200 m2 of which half is destined to housing with 4 large bedrooms, 2 bedrooms en suite (possibility of locating several business models) and 600 m2 of restaurant.  In addition, the property has stables for 8-10 horses, a flamenco show, a magnificent 25x11 meters swimming pool, old subway cellars and an extraordinary bullring. The restaurant is perfectly equipped with bar, equipped kitchen, dining room and 5 toilets. It also has a large wood oven and fireplace. Ideal for organizing events, hotel, etc. The municipalities of Alalpardo and Valdeolmos are located in the spectacular protected natural environment of the Jarama basin and very close to the A-1. Ideal location for all those who wish to live in a quiet environment and want to enjoy outdoor sports, walks and the magnificent views of the valley and the Guadarrama mountain range. The municipality has two schools, one public bilingual and the other one "Colegio ARULA" of great prestige and magnificent municipal sports facilities. Very close to the center of town is the Retamares Golf Club for lovers of this sport. The architecture of Alalpardo is very neat and does not exceed two floors in the buildings, the rest of the village is made up of recently built and beautiful townhouses and detached villas of high quality and excellent views. It is a young town where the average age of the population does not exceed 40 years. Alalpardo is perfectly communicated with Madrid through various bus lines, quick access to the A-1 and the M-50. Very close to the business developments of Las Tablas, Ciudad de Telefónica and BBVA La Vela, and 15 minutes from Barajas airport.

It has approx. 350 m2 of housing on a very nice plot with a pool and bar-type space. On the main floor we access a nice hallway, here we find the very large living room with fireplace and access to the garden. On the same floor there is a guest toilet and the large kitchen that is fully equipped with an island. From both the living room and the kitchen you can access the dining room. Via the staircase we reach the first half floor where we find two bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and two bathrooms, the master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom. The next half floor, the attic, has a large open space on two levels that could be a multipurpose space and two bedrooms that share a bathroom. In the basement level we have the service room with its own bathroom, a room that could be a large storage room and a very large room with a window that is currently a large office but that serves several functions: living room, gym, etc. The covered garage is for up to 2 cars. The house has a nice garden with a pool and a nice construction to enjoy next to the pool in a bar. It is a house that stands out for its spaciousness, with a homely feel ideal for a family with children who love nature. The Miraval urbanization has a community pool and a well-known golf club. The municipality of Alalpardo is located thirty minutes from Madrid, in the spectacular protected natural environment of the Jarama basin and very close to the A-1. Ideal location for all those who wish to live in a quiet environment and want to enjoy outdoor sports, walks through nature and the magnificent views of the valley and the Guadarrama mountain range. The municipality has two schools, one public bilingual and another subsidized, in addition to having magnificent municipal sports facilities. Very close to the center of town is the Retamares Golf Club. Alalpardo is perfectly connected to Madrid through various bus lines, and access to the A-1 and M-50. Very close to the business developments of Las Tablas, Ciudad de Telefónica and BBVA La Vela, Alalpardo is just fifteen minutes away.

PROPERTIES IN THE BIDDING PERIOD FROM 01/31/2024 TO 6:00 PM Welcome to the perfect home in Valdeolmos! If you are looking for a three-bedroom family apartment with a garage and storage room, you have found the ideal place! This duplex apartment has aluminum exterior carpentry, veneered wood interior carpentry, parquet floors (except in the kitchen and bathroom, which are stoneware) and electric heating for air conditioning. In addition, you will enjoy a parking space and private storage room for greater convenience. With 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, this home is perfect for a family or even for an investor looking to rent the apartment. The building is located in the northeast area of the municipality, in a residential environment and very well connected to the surrounding towns. Just 7 kilometers from Algete, it has good communications through the M-123 highway, the M-112 that connects with Fuente El Saz del Jarama and also has a bus service. Don't miss the opportunity to live in this home with all the comforts you need. Contact us at to coordinate a visit. Reference 9618.

For information and visits call Alberto Peñalver (642/34/70/72) Volga Real Estate offers this spectacular semi-detached house for sale in Valdeolmos-Alalpardo, a municipality located northwest of the Community of Madrid, near Algete and Fuente el Saz de Jarama. The house built in 2007 with very good qualities is distributed over four floors of approximately 290 total square meters. It has a private garage, 2 storage rooms, 5 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, 2 kitchens, swimming pool and charming garden-terrace, 3 living areas including the main living room. LOW LEVEL: We find a toilet, a storage room, a large area for parties, meetings and celebrations with a dining table, sofas, TV, pool table... , this gives access to the secondary kitchen that has a refrigerator, washing machine, storage areas and sink. At the same time, it connects with the garden that has outdoor furniture, swimming pool, artificial grass floor, and a storage room. MAIN FLOOR: We have the hall with a storage closet, toilet, garage (currently enabled as a bedroom) with capacity for 1 car, main living room with 2 rooms (living and dining area) and air conditioning, main kitchen equipped with all appliances and both rooms overlook to a terrace-balcony that connects with the garden-pool. FIRST FLOOR: Here we have the main bedroom area, 2 secondary bedrooms, 1 full bathroom, master bedroom with dressing room, built-in wardrobe and full en-suite bathroom with shower and window. ATTIC: Large open area of 85 meters that is currently used as a children's play area, bedroom and living room. This floor has air conditioning. Two bus lines arrive at the municipality, one of them leaves from the Plaza de Castilla Interchange. Line 182: Madrid (Plaza de Castilla)-Algete-Valdeolmos Line 254: Valdeolmos/Fuente el Saz de Jarama-Alcalá de Henares. You can also negotiate a rent with option to buy.

INMOBILIARIA TECNICA NORTE SELLS SPECTACULAR SEMI-DETACHED HOUSE IN THE MIRAVAL URBANIZATION, ALALPARDO (MADRID). One of the most exclusive and sought-after urbanizations in the area, as it enjoys being in a natural environment which offers comfort and tranquility with proximity to the prestigious Retamares golf course while enjoying a variety of services, such as restaurants, swimming pool, public transportation and sports areas in the urbanization. Chalet divided into four mezzanines, distributed as follows; Main floor; The main hall of the house is accessed through a glass porch. You can also access the living room and kitchen from the back porch. The modern independent kitchen consists of about 25m2 with several rooms such as the dining room or work area, on the other hand. Part of the living room consists of 40 m2 with a fireplace and has access to the back porch. The floor also has a guest toilet. Second floor: we find a single bedroom with a built-in wardrobe, a very bright double bedroom with a wonderful built-in wardrobe with a large exterior full bathroom with two sinks and a shower tray (bedroom en suite), in the distributor on this floor there is also another bathroom complete. Third floor; On this floor we find a master bedroom with a custom-made wardrobe on one of the side walls with a full bathroom and another double bedroom. Basement; where the garage is located with space for two cars, it can be accessed from the garden and from inside the house. On this floor, in addition to the garage, there is a large laundry room and a bathroom with a shower, as well as a storage closet in the stairwell. The plot has 750 m2, a front garden with trees and a rear garden with a wonderful private pool surrounded by wooden floors. Regarding the qualities of the house: the windows are PVC and double glazed, the floors are made of wood and stoneware, the lacquered oak doors, gotelé and smooth walls, it also has a private pool, natural gas heating, the golf course is located about 400m from the house. In addition, we have a financial department, in which you can obtain advice without obligation and at no cost to know your possibilities and have better options and guarantees when purchasing. According to the client's profile we get.

Spectacular 270 m2 corner townhouse for sale. The house has four floors distributed as follows; The ground floor is distributed in an entrance hall with built-in wardrobes, a magnificent separate living-dining room, a furnished and partially equipped kitchen with a closed clothesline and pantry, a full bathroom and a large 25 m2 garage with an automatic door. On the first floor we find two spectacular double bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and the third and main bedroom has an en-suite bathroom, dressing room and terrace. Finally we find another full bathroom. On the second floor or under cover we find a large open-plan room of almost 30 m2 with attic ceilings with access to a large terrace with unbeatable views. The semi-basement floor is distributed in a bedroom or room with multiple uses either as a gym, office or games room, a wonderful living room that leads to the back garden with a sunny area ideal as a porch, a toilet and a small storage room taking advantage of the stairwell. Housing with excellent qualities, oak carpentry, smooth paint, parquet and stoneware floors, tilt-and-turn windows, motorized blinds, central vacuum system, air conditioning throughout the house and through ducts on the first floor, individual natural gas heating. Front patio with access to the house and backyard. Located in Alalpardo, a quiet residential area and close to all services, schools, pharmacy, sports center, etc. WE DO NOT CHARGE COMMISSION TO THE BUYER.

description: INMOBILIARIA TÉCNICA NORTE, sells a house in the center of town in perfect condition to move into. The house has 139 m2 and a plot of about 150, as well as a garage with capacity for 3 cars. The kitchen is fully equipped with furniture and appliances in good condition. From the kitchen you can access the interior patio, ideal for enjoying outdoor dinners. The bathrooms are complete, with a bathtub and tiles in good condition. All rooms are exterior and have air conditioning. Two of the rooms are doubles, while the other two are singles. The house is in perfect condition, ready to move into. It has climalit enclosures and bars on all windows that face the outside. At the back of the house there is a patio of about 150m2 with buildings that can be used to store materials or machinery or leave it open plan. The location is excellent, in the center of town, close to all the necessary services, such as supermarkets, shops, restaurants and schools. In addition, it has good public transport connections.
